tool_description: Is this comment positive or negative? Find out the tone.
name: Sentiment Analysis
title: Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: Analyze (post)
api_list.description: Return sentiment analysis results with score for the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Enter some text to analyze (maximum 100 words or 1,500 characters)
parameters.default: great value in its price range!

utterances.utterance: Analyze the sentiment of the text: 'I absolutely love this product, it exceeded my expectations!'

parameters.text: I absolutely love this product, it exceeded my expectations!

utterances.utterance: What is the sentiment of the comment: 'The service was terrible and I will not be returning.'?

parameters.text: The service was terrible and I will not be returning.

utterances.utterance: Determine the tone of the following review: 'The food was okay, but the ambiance was fantastic.'

parameters.text: The food was okay, but the ambiance was fantastic.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze this feedback: 'I am not satisfied with the quality of the product.'?

parameters.text: I am not satisfied with the quality of the product.

utterances.utterance: Please find out the sentiment of this statement: 'The movie was a complete waste of time.'

parameters.text: The movie was a complete waste of time.

utterances.utterance: What is the sentiment score for: 'I had a wonderful experience at the hotel, highly recommend it!'?

parameters.text: I had a wonderful experience at the hotel, highly recommend it!

utterances.utterance: Analyze the tone of this message: 'The new update is quite disappointing and buggy.'

parameters.text: The new update is quite disappointing and buggy.

utterances.utterance: Is the sentiment of this review positive or negative: 'The customer service was exceptional and very helpful.'?

parameters.text: The customer service was exceptional and very helpful.

utterances.utterance: Determine the sentiment of this feedback: 'I am extremely happy with my purchase, it works perfectly.'

parameters.text: I am extremely happy with my purchase, it works perfectly.

utterances.utterance: What is the sentiment of the following comment: 'The delivery was late and the package was damaged.'?

parameters.text: The delivery was late and the package was damaged.
